welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Haacht, a charming city known for its rich history, delicious beer, and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture and discover all that Haacht has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal for international flights, with modern facilities and amenities.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Zoersel Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
